title: My account is banned with no reason
body: Have ur guys' accounts been banned before? RIOT banned my account for MMR boosting which means someone login to my account and play games, but no one login to my account! I ve been playing normal game recently. Who cheats in normal games OMG! ? ! ? That s fuckin ridiculous. And I ve been in gold 5 0 points more than half year. If I cheat in rank, why am I still in gold 5 0 point? Does it make real sense? I spent more than $1000 on this account to buy skins, but now they removed my rank rewards and banned my account. I m not gonna play this fuckin game if they cannot solve this problem and they should refund all costs I spent.

replies.body: If you want the reason for your ban clarified then please submit a ticket to player support detailing your request: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
